name: Goldsaver Adventure
description:
[English]

Goldsaver Adventure is a 2D side-scrolling game set in a medieval era, where the protagonist is a paladin who must recover the king's treasure.

The kingdom of Galore, a place known for its great wealth, is frequently the victim of robberies by mercenaries from other kingdoms.

You are Stephan Goldsaver, a paladin of royalty, entrusted with the task of recovering the king's stolen treasure.

[Español]

Goldsaver Adventure es un juego 2D de desplazamiento lateral ambientado en una era medieval, donde el protagonista es un paladin que debe recuperar el tesoro del rey.

El reino de Galore, un lugar conocido por su gran riqueza, es frecuentemente víctima de robos por mercenarios de otros reinos.

Eres Stephan Goldsaver, un paladín de la realeza, a quien se le ha confiado la tarea de recuperar el tesoro robado del rey.

[Credits for some resources]
